track.name: The Summer Wind
comments: No relation to the notorious 'wayward wind', I trust.
No not Billie. DMac only has to really listen to realise that

DMac...sure the tech used to record billie was bad...and 10 years from now they'll be saying that about today's recordings...and they'll have figured out how to get billie's sound crisp...further....and don't want to start a fight here...madeline is wonderful and definitely carries billie's ghost...but better than billie? YOU'RE CRAZY!!! ...sorry didn't mean to shout...lol...
mis xmas 30 celis sio dakravs..this voice...so nice.
Madeleine !!!!  du miel dans mes oreilles !!!
as always.... masterful..... and lovely phrasing....
Was für eine Stimme....wahnsinn. Wunderschönes Lied
make even me long a little bit for summer....

i actually believe she is a definite improvement over Billie Holiday... she has the characteristics but has better technique and of course much better recording quality that comes from modern technology. Ms Peyroux is one of my all time favorites... class, style, talent, skill, with that perfect tonal and harmonic color that makes for a sincere and unpretentious quality seldom matched.
na ez már valami,ilyen a jó zene.
oh i love this song.... and a great version.....smooth sax solo
vientos de verano, vientos de notas musicales bien enlazada y cantadas.
go maddy.. jazz them all up
The Summer Wind surely has been recorded by a large number of artists. I think this version is very haunting and well handled by M P. Love her voice,need to see her live.
